p: RTPCR analysis of 50 genes selected for the validation study showed significant differential expression of the genes for the regeneration mechanism (Fig. 2a,b). Almost all the up and downregulated genes which were identified from the transcriptomic analysis were found to be associated with regeneration through differential regulation based on RTPCR analysis (Fig. 1c). Heat map analysis of the gene expression based on RTPCR analysis also showed association of 2 and 5-dpa as cluster against 1-dpa expression.
